name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CutieCats - New tab images of cats & kittens

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for people who love cats!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CutieCats replaces your new tab page with a beautiful image of a cat. New image every day!
